transitions.has_paper: t.val = 0; t.i = 0; loop(27, {t.val = q.is_item_name_any('slot.inventory', t.i, 'minecraft:paper'); t.val ? {return t.val;}; t.i = t.i+1;});

transitions.default: t.i = 0; loop(27, {q.is_item_name_any('slot.inventory', t.i, 'minecraft:paper') ? {return false;}; t.i = t.i+1;}); return true;

t.i = 0; loop(27, {q.is_item_name_any('slot.inventory', t.i, 'jig_ccomp:mob_paper','jig_ccomp:printed_paper','jig_ccomp:old_bug_paper','jig_ccomp:ok_bug_paper','jig_ccomp:good_bug_paper') ? {return false;}; t.i = t.i+1;}); return true;
